attributes.action: Reverse the decision by the Health Board to remove Doctors from Llandudno MIU
attributes.background: Betsi Cadwaladr have made the decision to remove doctors from the MIU in Llandudno Hospital, it will be run solely by Nurses this is both unfair to the Nurses who are under enough pressure but will also impact on patient treatment as some cases need a Doctors treatment/diagnosis. Another downgrade!

rejection.details:
Your petition is about something that the Welsh Government is responsible for.  Health Care in Wales is the responsibility of the Welsh Government. 

The Welsh Assembly has its own Petitions Committee. If you'd like to send your petition to the Welsh Assembly, you can find out more here:
http://www.assembly.wales/en/gethome/e-petitions/Pages/e-petitions.aspx
